titleInfo.title: Grand Ole Opry - Pet Milk - #131 - 1958-09-26 - WSM

mods.accessCondition: This audio file is the property of the Country Music Hall of Fame® and Museum and may be protected by U.S. and international copyright laws. To inquire about use permissions and obtain a high-quality version of this, contact audio@countrymusichalloffame.org. Please cite audio file information in email.
mods.abstract: Pet Milk sponsored Grand Ole Opry segment from September 26, 1958. Featuring T. Tommy Cutrer (host/performer), Flatt & Scruggs (performers), Foggy Mountain Boys (performer), Rod Brasfield (performer), Jordanaires (performers), Marvin Hughes (performer), and Tommy Warren (performer). Listed as episode #131, broadcast on radio station WSM (Nashville, Tenn.)

subject.topic: Flatt and Scruggs and the Foggy Mountain Boys (Musical group)

recordInfo.recordContentSource: Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum
